Type.Name: DrawGdkHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DrawGdkHandler(object o, DrawGdkArgs args);

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the DrawGdkHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the DrawGdkHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the DrawGdkHandler is removed from the event.
